players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "Diana is lying. I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote for Bob."

Diana: "I investigated Alice and she is mafioso. Bob is silent because he's town. Trust me, vote Alice."
